nodes.text: Thookah-steaks were a foodstuff made from thookahs and a type of steak. Thookah-steaks made from thookahs that had been fed savorium by the Ithorian scientist Zorneth ultimately caused the Krozurbian War Council to end a 200-year war, as these steaks produced the same pacifistic euphoria in their consumers as occurred in those who consumed savorium directly.
Thookah-steaks were mentioned in Jan Strnad's comic book Droids (1995) 8, published by Dark Horse Comics in 1995.
